name: FRigUnit_SendEvent
doc: SendEvent is used to notify the engine / editor of a change that happend within the Control Rig.

Event: The event to send to the engine
Item: The item to send the event for
OffsetInSeconds: The time offset to use for the send event
bEnable: The event will be sent if this is checked
bOnlyDuringInteraction: The event will be sent if this only during an interaction
ExecuteContext: * This property is used to chain multiple mutable units together
